card.name: Ronan the Accuser
card.property: Toughness. Ronan the Accuser cannot be stunned. Forced Interrupt: When the villain phase begins, Ronan the Accuser engages the hero with the fewest remaining hit points.

card.name: Judge, Jury, Executioner
card.property: Forced Response: After a friendly character is defeated by an enemy attack, place 2 threat on the main scheme.

card.name: The Accused
card.property: Attach to your identity. Foreced Interrupt: When an enemy initiates an attack against the attached identity, that enemy gets +1 ATK for the attack. Foreced Response: After Ronan the Accuser is defeated, discard this card.

card.name: Bring the Hammer Down
card.property: When Revealed: Ronan the Accuser activates against the player he is engaged with. If Ronan the Accuser is not in play, this card gains surge.

card.name: You Dare Oppose Me?
card.property: When Revealed: Discard the top 5 cards of the encounter deck. Each time a card belonging to the Kree Fanatic set is discarded this way, deal that card to yourself as a facedown encounter card.
